title: Management fees ec campus
content: If I do not get anything in kcet or comedk how much is management fees for cse/ece in ec campus??

comments.body: 48 lakh for four years is absurd for both campuses tbh, btw idk why you think its absurd just for ec(going based off faqs both campuses are pretty similar)
I just did think it would be a little lesser than that
60 jaega total 4 saal ka iss saal badh gaya hai
